none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 19, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
My friends....this one is real good. If you like your sounds hollow and demented, then you're going to want to get on the LIDÉRC bandwagon. An avalanche of primitive churning metal delivered with the intensity (and fidelity) of modern era raw punk. Like BONE AWL and HATE PREACHERS collaborating on a Kill 'Em All Halloween cover set, and recording the whole experiment in a cave. On a shitty 4-track. There are a scant few physical copies of this tape in the world, but there are still a few available from Szégyen Kazetták - you know, the folks also responsible for the ELECTRIC DRUG FUCK UP tape. You're welcome....now go wreck everything. Not limited to, but definitely including, yourself. LIDÉRC
https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEhmhIk6oAyNpv8BpAOFZ-gp3xFmmFqFGciavJS6VWwjPRdp0CjnJ7QQ1D7vOhvT-d3-Bmj8jop9PAJzmZ7SWobOrVT12Mw8UfZGmjBetSQjpV1up7xAXlXhvLWxR7bB5J6brgqLDzmbqBQMQi3bR1bSDoSn07jj1P0bAEi1xbOXP62bxK1iLYG32gdgLg=s772 https://szegyenkazettak.bandcamp.com/album/demo-4 https://szegyenkazettak.bandcamp.com/music https://szegyenkazettak.bandcamp.com/album/electric-drug-fuck-up https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEhhEwIVgrEL5Gam6JBpkUwCzsRGNjrQTYtZsoM1i2B71RzGLhhTtn_2BW21q8RSAC4TMhYNZBJAg3HNgccS6NLK4odHQ5u6jK98jQkUG_uYZiByhLTuRiaJRJyyP2Byk52Lm05BkSwFfXYZgtXoMvhX1jBv6rt2GVZZ8SMsY0_8QaqRKSZylVUq2W0g5A=s705 https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEjOVLgW8K6nNgrY-CV1N-71U8XgYLmJnmkbcG6n4MyAmwtthjDPTxF3PM6TaGr2ZZhiOxu5j4Q79AVwffsZpoB6jvN12Do1dksE-QZPzAzFBxqepOOfDOkvZk9tJ05S-LHaHotGZCxRz81xgepo_tS7-jao2wdMiAspZTn3Y-ZfpoOg_oNP2tMybkv_8A=s796

seo.title: Lidérc - Lidérc cassette 2020 - Terminal Escape
